sense.def:
To grope for something
pomeni z rokami iskati nekaj, česar ne vidimo.

seg.quote: I groped for the timetable I had in my pocket.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To grope one's way to a place
pomeni premakniti se na neki kraj, tako da otipavamo pot z rokami, ker ničesar ne vidimo.

seg.quote: I groped my way out of bed and downstairs.

sense.def:
To grope for something
pomeni poskusiti se nečesa domisliti, na primer rešitve problema, kadar sploh ne vemo, kakšna bi lahko bila.

seg.quote: We are groping for ways to get the communities together.
